product_name: Patagonia Baby Sun-Lite Hoodie Pullover - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The Baby Sun-Lite Hoodie pullover from Patagonia is made of soft polyester with an odor control finish to keep little ones feeling fresh while frolicking in the sun. Polyester fabric has a soft feel she'll love to wear. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay; plus, it's nonpolluting, safe and durable. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Kangaroo-style patch pocket keeps hands dry and warm.
short_description: The Baby Sun-Lite Hoodie pullover from Patagonia is made of soft polyester with an odor control finish to keep little ones feeling fresh while frolicking in the sun.
